name: 克里斯·史壮克斯
name_full: 克里斯·史壮克斯 Criss Strokes
introduction: Boyishly-handsome, tall and athletically-built Criss Strokes, who has gone by the names of Chris Strokes, Chriss Strokes, Cris Strokes, Chris Holmes, Criss Strokes and Braden throughout the course of his porn career, made his debut back in 2006. He has since then been working for various studios and companies within the porn industry and is perhaps one of the most popular and reliable performers in the business. Undoubtedly a favorite of both male and female viewers and co-stars who have seen Criss in his entire physical splendor, this man has not been hunting for work ever since breaking into the porn scene and is certainly well on his way to forging a considerable legacy in the business.
